name: Rocket Punch!
description:
Defeat villain by Stretching your arms.
Guns and knives can't beat the villain completely.
You can defeat the villain completely with a rocket.
Adjust the rocket punch that flies towards the villain.

Game features:
1. It's a new puzzle game. solve a problem by adjusting the rocket punch
2. It's a physics puzzle that makes you fall into it.
3. The new mission will continue to be added. Send me some good ideas.
